courseName: Master of Science in International Addiction Studies (IPAS) MSc
facultyName: Institute of Psychiatry, Psychology and Neuroscience
description: The Master of Science in International Addiction Studies (IPAS) course offers students cross‐cultural exposure to critical prevention and treatment practices, as well as research and policy issues in the field of addiction. This programme provides unique opportunities to study addiction in its broadest sense and examine key issues from an international perspective
duration: One year FT, Two years PT
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
